mapper.select: select `art`.`id`,`video`.`id`,`art`.`picture_url`,`video`.`picture_url`,`art`.`title`,`video`.`title` ,`user`.`username`,`mat`.`material`,`cui`.`category` from `cul_article` AS `art` INNER JOIN `cul_user` AS `user` ON `user`.`id` = `art`.`author_id` INNER JOIN `cul_cuisine` AS `cui` ON `cui`.`id` = `art`.`cuisine_id` INNER JOIN `cul_material` AS `mat` ON `mat`.`id` = `art`.`material_id` INNER JOIN `cul_browsing_history` AS `bh` ON `bh`.`article_id`=`art`.`id` INNER JOIN `cul_video` AS `video` ON `bh`.`video_id`=`video`.`id` where `bh`.`user_id` = ${userId};
